metadata.name: Abused Debug Privilege by Arbitrary Parent Processes
metadata.comment: Detection of unusual child processes by different system processes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\winlogon.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\services.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\lsass.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\csrss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\smss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\wininit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\spoolsv.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\searchindexer.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\\.exe', 'pwsh\\.dll', 'cmd\\.exe')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' route ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' add '))))

output.summary: Detection of unusual child processes by different system processes

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.parent_process.name, process.name, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown Reference: https://image.slidesharecdn.com/kheirkhabarovoffzonefinal-181117201458/95/hunting-for-privilege-escalation-in-windows-environment-74-638.jpg
